attributes.action: NOT allow any legislation that would put the responsibility for any vehicle versus cyclist accident automatically on to the vehicle driver
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will create an unfair law and one potentially open to exploitation by the unscrupulous.  It may well work in other countries but they will have more dedicated cycleways and better general  road conditions to support this concept.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
